description: This file serves as the __init__.py for the universalinit_env package, setting up module metadata, importing core components, and defining exports.

methods.name: get_template_path
methods.description: Retrieves the path to a template file used within the package.

methods.name: parse_template_file
methods.description: Parses a template file to extract its data.

methods.name: map_common_to_framework
methods.description: Converts environment variables from a common standard to a specific framework's format.

methods.name: map_framework_to_common
methods.description: Converts framework-specific environment variables to a common standard.

methods.name: get_supported_frameworks
methods.description: Returns a list of frameworks supported by the package.

methods.name: apply_wildcard_mapping
methods.description: Applies wildcard mappings to environment variables according to configuration.
